summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Lakeview Avenue, in the City of Seattle, from the north line of East Newton Street, by grading and curing the same, including all necessary bulkheads or retaining walls for cuts and fills, in accordance with Resolution No. 393 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
